components/brand/sidebar:
<nav>
    {{#if brand.faceted_search_enabled}}
        {{> components/faceted-search/index brand}}
    {{else}}
        <!-- All categories -->
        {{> components/themevale/sidebar/side-all-categories}}
        <!-- Shop by Brands -->
        {{> components/themevale/sidebar/side-shop-by-brands}}
        <!-- slider product -->
        {{#if products.featured}}
            {{> components/themevale/sidebar/featured-products products=products.featured}}
        {{/if}}
    {{/if}}
    <!-- advertisement image -->
    {{> components/themevale/sidebar/advertisement-image}}
    <!-- advertisement text -->
    {{> components/themevale/sidebar/advertisement-content}}
</nav>
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets this.selected}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/themevale/sidebar/side-all-ca:
Categories
{{#if categories}}
    {{#each categories}}
  • {{#if children}} {{name}}
      {{#each children}} {{> components/themevale/sidebar/sub-categories}} {{/each}}
    {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/themevale/sidebar/side-shop-b:
{{lang 'brand.label'}}
    {{#each shop_by_brand}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
  • {{lang 'common.view_all'}}
components/themevale/sidebar/featured-pr:
{{lang 'products.featured'}}
{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer show_rating=../settings.show_product_rating show_wishlist=../settings.show_wishlist}}
{{/each}}
components/themevale/sidebar/sub-categor:
• {{#if children}} {{name}}
      {{#each children}} {{> components/themevale/sidebar/sub-categories}} {{/each}}
    {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}
components/products/card:
{{#if brand.name}}

{{brand.name}}

{{/if}}

{{name}}

{{#if show_rating}}

{{> components/products/ratings rating=rating}} {{#if num_reviews}} ({{num_reviews}}) {{/if}}

{{/if}} {{#if show_compare}} {{/if}}
{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
{{#if show_wishlist}}
{{/if}}
{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{#if show_cart_action}} {{#if has_options}} {{lang 'products.choose_options'}} {{/if}} {{#if pre_order}} {{lang 'products.pre_order'}} {{/if}} {{#if add_to_cart_url }} {{lang 'products.add_to_cart'}} {{/if}} {{#if out_of_stock_message }} {{out_of_stock_message}} {{/if}} {{/if}} {{/or}}
components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}
{{#if this.items}}
    {{#each this.items}}
  • {{#if facet '===' 'rating'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.rating-label' rating=title}} {{else}} {{{title}}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}}

{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}}

{{/if}} {{#if remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:
{{{title}}}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
{{#each current_selected_items}} {{/each}} {{#if this.sort}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/multi:
{{#if items}}
{{{title}}}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{{title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{ count }}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if show_more_toggle}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-more'}} {{/if}}
{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/rating:
{{#if items}}
{{{title}}}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{> components/products/ratings rating=title}} {{lang 'search.faceted.rating.and-up'}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{ count }}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
